ygData.subject: Re: Butcherblock
ygData.msgSnippet: I only have a very limited knowledge of a couple of things in Butcher.  I know that there is definitely a tie-in with Dvinn over in Crushbone; something akin
ygData.messageBody:
I only have a very limited knowledge of a couple of things in Butcher. I
know that there is definitely a tie-in with Dvinn over in Crushbone;
something akin to how Dvinn is twisting some evil plot with Emporer Crush
about something. (sorry, I forget) Anyway, there's a paladin's quest over
in Felwithe in which you are supposed to help foil this evil plot by
stopping Dvinn's orc messenger/runner in Butcher before he reaches his
destination. The plot unravels itself between this quest and the one on CB
for the screaming mace.

As for Corflunk and Zarchoomi there's a dwarf quest over in Kaladim in which
you are to collect their heads. I haven't completed this one yet so I have
a stinky head in my bank account.

Sorry I don't know more...
-- Lim'Dul

>There's a place there called the Orc Totem, a large totem pole in a
fairly small valley. Orc Oracles and Ceturions spawn there regularly.
>I've been told that this is where D'Vinn trained the orcs in the arcane
>arts. The hole in this story is D'Vinn. He's a rogue, not a mage - what
>would he know about trainning people in the arcane arts?
